experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Got an insight into one of the largest exporter of knitted garments. Gathered a detailed know how on how an export house functions and how such a large organization is operated. Also got a first hand experience of the technical facts about material handling and processing.

experience.title: Product Design Intern
experience.description: Ambalika is a N.G.O working for uplifting the primitive tribes of Jharkhand, India by working towards restoring the age old traditional handicrafts and hand loom of Jharkhand.The last semester graduation project was about increasing the product base for the indigenous handicraft in accordance to the urban lifestyle and needs so as to increase the recognition and sale of the hand crafted products. The material used was Kanshi grass (found in abundance beside water bodies in Jharkhand) and Bamboo.
experience.description_html: Ambalika is a N.G.O working for uplifting the primitive tribes of Jharkhand, India by working towards restoring the age old traditional handicrafts and hand loom of Jharkhand.The last semester graduation project was about increasing the product base for the indigenous handicraft in accordance to the urban lifestyle and needs so as to increase the recognition and sale of the hand crafted products. The material used was Kanshi grass (found in abundance beside water bodies in Jharkhand) and Bamboo.

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Looked through the processing of a design house - meeting with the clients, working on their requirements, processing the designs, technical drawings, prototyping, production, research regarding design among different range (classical, contemporary, solid, luxury, mixed) for the retail store project.As an individual design project, created wall signs for the firm.
